Hello.txt

Hello.java

Welcome to my page! My name is Tianci Hu Marrero (Iggee) and I am a software developer.

I am a Chinese mainlander and I recently moved to the U.S. with my family. During the 1.5 of immigration flux (translate: moving 3 dogs and a dozen boxes to the U.S., finding a place to rent, waiting for the work permit, etc), I started teaching myself computer science.

I started with the classic MERN stack. The beauty of self-teaching is that eventually, you get fast at learning new techs (learned next.js for this portfolio site, kind of an overkill but fun). I have written python data projects employing MySQL and pandas. I have written an OOP-style clone of Space Invaders in Java. I have also dabbled with OS scheduling & locking in C.

Currently, my interests are in lower-level fundamentals because I found that knowing these things always helped me be a better programmer.

Previously, I worked as a full-time interpreter/translator and technical writer. I also briefly worked a video producer for a Beijing startup.

In my free time I like dancing salsa, lifting weights, and reading.

This site is used to demonstrate my projects and store my studynotes.

Thank you for visiting.
